title: What doesâ€‹ it take for your LoL account to get suspended or banned?
body: A few weeks ago I left a matchmake game to attend to urgent business, I have done this a few times before (about 8 times) but recently I didn't get any sort of punishment. Will my LoL account be suspended sooner or later?

replies.body: There's a chance of you being hit with a temporary low-priority queue for a few matches if you leave games pretty often, but every once and awhile is completely understandable. You won't be suspended either, it'll just take longer to find a few matches is all.
If they were all in a short amount of time, I'm pretty sure that you will get some sort of punishment for it. if you're talking like in a span of a year, you're probably alright
